posts.title: NAF_debug
posts.text: 源码链接： NAF数据集下载链接: [DATA]https://github.com/YingqianWang/iPASSR 调试之路问题汇总终端运行时，因位置问题查不到不到当前目录下的包123$ import sys$sys.path.append("E:\\paper\\code\\NAFNet-main") # 保证在终端运行时，可以被检索到目录 windows环境不支持nucc12$ backend='gloo' #将option的位置文件中nvcc改为gloo torch.distributed.elastic.multiprocessing.api:failed (exitcode:或者childerror1#将batch_size和num_worker改小，如果只测试调通那么设置为1 数据集准备下载数据集和IPASR源码，将训练数据放入./data/train中，使用.m文件处理数据得到数据集，测试集直接解压即可 demo代码测试首先根据requirement文件下载相应包然后在终端代码中输入相应代码实现，遇见问题如上图

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post``’ bash$ hexo new “My New Post” More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html) ### Run server ``` bash $ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
